SEARCH
Package assignment05_000921540

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
assignment05_000921540.Worker
Direct Known Subclasses:
Drill, Miner
public class Worker extends Object
This is a basic class for our more specific workers to draw from. This class will track the amount that the worker mines, the number of workers, and the size of the drawing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Worker(int x, int y)
    The constructor for the basic worker class, predefining the size and the amount to 10 and 1 respectively.
